title: Truly a joke of a company
body: The people at Riot have their hearts set on banning people who flame, whilst not giving a single fuck about kids that troll. Dont worry, as long as you talk passive aggressively while youre trolling, you wont be banned on this shit fucking game. Literally can't believe what a world of fucking pussies we live in.
